Game.Name: Double Clutch (Europe)
Game.plot: Gameplay:Picking one of four drivers, each with different strengths and weaknesses, the player sets off to finish first on not one, not two, but three different tracks. Each race consists of three laps against 6 AI drivers (or an additional second player). After finishing, the prize money can be spend on upgrading the car.The three tracks are being driven multiple times in different weather conditions: dry, rain and snow. A damage meter shows the state the car is in and drops when running into other drivers or when crashing off course.Playable driversTodd Wheeler "Power is all you need."Lance Quick "Clutch the early lead!"Pam Wilder "Can't win if you crash."Joe Thunder "Don't spin your wheels."
Game.Notes: Double Clutch is an overhead racing game similar to Super Off Road. One or two players choose from four different drivers, each with their own special ability, then head out for a race on one of four different tracks. Of course, the goal is to be the first to finish three laps of the course, but watch out for your opponents; bump into them or the terrain and your vehicle will take damage. Take too much damage and it's game over! After each race, winnings can be used to upgrade or repair the vehicle. There are three difficulty levels, which affect how quickly the vehicle takes damage. There is also a practice mode where the player can freely choose any track.
